text: [Ej mu'minon] Omezis ʙo hamsaronaton dar saʙ [-hoi] ruza ʙar sumo halol gardidaast. Onon liʙosi sumo hastand va sumo liʙosi eson. Alloh taolo medonist, ki sumo ʙar xud xijonat mekarded [va ʙo on ki dar avoili islom omezis dar mohi ramazon harom ʙud, sumo ʙar on ʙetavaccuh ʙuded], pas, tavʙaatonro paziruftu az sumo darguzast. Pas, aknun [dar saʙhoi ramazon metavoned] ʙo onon omezis kuned va on ciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙarojaton muqarrar dostaast [az eson] talaʙ kuned. Bixured va ʙiosomed, to ristai sapedi suʙh [facri sodiq] az ristai sijoh [saʙ] ʙarojaton oskor gardad, on goh ruzaro to saʙ ʙa pojon ʙirasoned va, dar hole ki dar masocid mu'takif hasted, ʙo zanon omezis nakuned. In marzho [-i ahkom]-i ilohi ast, pas, ʙa onho nazdik nasaved. Alloh taolo cunin ojot [va ahkom]-i xudro ʙaroi mardum ravsan mesozad, ʙosad, ki parhezkor savand
